content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: mossy_cobblestone
inventory=[{"type": "vine", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "creeper_spawn_egg", "quantity": 8, "index": 12}, {"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 40, "index": 13}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 49, "index": 26}, {"type": "pink_carpet", "quantity": 42, "index": 28}, {"type": "music_disc_mall", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "fletching_table", "quantity": 63, "index": 39}, {"type": "mossy_stone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 61, "index": 44}, {"type": "fire_coral_fan", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft mossy_cobblestone, I need to place 1 vine and 1 cobblestone side by side in the crafting grid. The vine is at slot 11, and therefore I will move it into the crafting grid at slot 1.
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: mossy_cobblestone
inventory=[{"type": "vine", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "creeper_spawn_egg", "quantity": 8, "index": 12}, {"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 40, "index": 13}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 49, "index": 26}, {"type": "pink_carpet", "quantity": 42, "index": 28}, {"type": "music_disc_mall", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "fletching_table", "quantity": 63, "index": 39}, {"type": "mossy_stone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 61, "index": 44}, {"type": "fire_coral_fan", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]
thought: The cobblestone is at slot 22, and therefore I will move it into the crafting grid at slot 2.
act: move from slot 22 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: mossy_cobblestone
inventory=[{"type": "mossy_cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "vine", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "creeper_spawn_egg", "quantity": 8, "index": 12}, {"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 40, "index": 13}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 49, "index": 26}, {"type": "pink_carpet", "quantity": 42, "index": 28}, {"type": "music_disc_mall", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "fletching_table", "quantity": 63, "index": 39}, {"type": "mossy_stone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 61, "index": 44}, {"type": "fire_coral_fan", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I can craft the mossy_cobblestone by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
